solution_line_template: After 1 day, the family drank {total_bottles} bottles * {fraction_day1} = <<{total_bottles}*{fraction_day1}={drank_day1}>>{drank_day1} bottles

On the 2nd day they drank half of the remaining {remaining_after_day1}, so half would be leftover at the end of day 2, or {remaining_after_day1} * {fraction_day2} = <<{remaining_after_day1}*{fraction_day2}={drank_day2}>>{drank_day2} bottles
